Taste that spoonful and that cool and refreshing feel will spread through your mouth instantly, dispelling any negative emotions you may harbor to the point where you feel like you've become a new person.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Satiety Gel
special.description: Aloy's specialty. The cross-section looks perfect, its shape is regular, and it gives off a cool air. At first, Aloy seemed a bit apprehensive as to whether you'd enjoy this rather unique dessert, but she was relieved when you wolfed it all down in one go...
special.effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP to the selected character.

name: Mint Salad
description: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mint Salad
suspicious.description: A fragrant salad dish. The Mint and Jueyun Chili have neither been matched nor incorporated well, which makes for a dish so spicy that any who eat it will be at a loss for words for a time.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Mint Salad
normal.description: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Mint Salad
delicious.description: A fragrant salad dish. The slightly bitter minty-fresh flavors do not cover the blazing mouthfeel of the Jueyun Chili but instead cause the spiciness to reach new heights. The two whirl and pirouette on your tongue like a pair of contending dancers to the hearty and vigorous applause of all.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Miso Soup
description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The ingredients used here are very common and it is made simply, but this small bowl of soup has the power to ensure that you shall not grow weary on your journey, even if you travel on foot.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Miso Soup
suspicious.description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The wilted seagrass, the crushed little bits of tofu, and the overly thick flavor are a real hazard to one's mood if consumed first thing in the morning.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Miso Soup
normal.description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The ingredients used here are very common and it is made simply, but this small bowl of soup has the power to ensure that you shall not grow weary on your journey, even if you travel on foot.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Miso Soup
delicious.description: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The flavorful soup gives off a leaven fragrance. One mouthful of this with rice will ensure the completeness of the entire meal.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

name: Mixed Yakisoba
description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. One merely needs to stir-fry the noodles and side dishes evenly before serving, making this an easy-to-make and filling dish. It is no wonder, then, that this dish is so sought after among Inazumans.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mixed Yakisoba
suspicious.description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Both the noodles and the side dishes show signs of having been burned black, testament to the tragedy that must have befallen earlier.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Mixed Yakisoba
normal.description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. One merely needs to stir-fry the noodles and side dishes evenly before serving, making this an easy-to-make and filling dish. It is no wonder, then, that this dish is so sought after among Inazumans.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Mixed Yakisoba
delicious.description: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Some mysterious art of seasoning has been imparted upon the slightly curled noodles and ordinary side dishes. Smooth, springy, rich... the magic at work on the plate is such that one will never tire of cleaning it out.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
suspicious.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire. Sadly, it's a bit too well done. The charred smell and the dry texture are not too impressive.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
normal.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
delicious.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, locking the delicious juice inside the meat under the crispy skin. A small bite is all that's needed to unlock its wondrous and delicious taste.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
special.description: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
suspicious.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
normal.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
delicious.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Puppy-Paw Hash Brown
special.description: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.
special.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

name: Moon Pie
description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Moon Pie
suspicious.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. The burnt-yellow meringue looks barely passable. Don't let any Mondstadt locals see you dead with this thing, or they might just take it upon themselves to ensure that you never fail again.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Moon Pie
normal.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% and DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Moon Pie
delicious.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. As you cut a slice off this small meat pie, the aromas of butter and meat assault your senses simultaneously. The rustic, sweet mouthfeel reminds you of the sights and sounds of harvest festivals, bringing a smile unbidden to your face.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% and DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Stormcrest Pie
special.description: Eula's specialty. It's hard to say if the unorthodox, non-full-moon shape is meant to flout tradition or express her "tooth for a tooth" ethos. A rich, savory, and smoky flavor emanates from beneath the golden outer crust, unlikely to be reproducible by anybody else in Mondstadt. Best not to tell her all this, though, lest she add it to her list of personal vendettas.
special.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 40% and DEF by 282 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Mora Meat
description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mora Meat
suspicious.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Mora Meat
normal.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Mora Meat
delicious.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Qiankun Mora Meat
special.description: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

name: More-and-More
description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. Water is added to flour and stirred into a slurry, vegetables and meat are added, and the mix is grilled well on an iron plate before taking on a splash of sauce and a sprinkle of dried bonito flakes. This tastes delicious no matter how many ingredients one adds, and indeed it makes people feel like "the more ingredients, the merrier," hence the dish's name.

suspicious.name: Suspicious More-and-More
suspicious.description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. It certainly looks the part, but you start getting a bad feeling about this upon first bite. Guess you can't slack off when making food after all, huh?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: More-and-More
normal.description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. Water is added to flour and stirred into a slurry, vegetables and meat are added, and the mix is grilled well on an iron plate before taking on a splash of sauce and a sprinkle of dried bonito flakes. This tastes delicious no matter how many ingredients one adds, and indeed it makes people feel like "the more ingredients, the merrier," hence the dish's name.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious More-and-More
delicious.description: A snack grilled on an iron plate. The rich ingredients have been stacked atop one another. One bite into the crisp outer layer reveals the soft tenderness within. The lovely sauce clothes the condiments luxuriously, flowing between lips and teeth alike en route to the stomach. Even the aroma that lingers in the air has ascended to become part of its unforgettable deliciousness.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Mushroom Pizza
description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mushroom Pizza
suspicious.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Mushroom Pizza
normal.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Mushroom Pizza
delicious.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

special.name: Invigorating Pizza
special.description: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?
special.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.

name: Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
description: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
suspicious.description: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.
suspicious.effect: Restores 40 Stamina

normal.name: Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
normal.description: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.
normal.effect: Restores 50 Stamina

delicious.name: Delicious Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
delicious.description: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles have absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.
delicious.effect: Restores 60 Stamina

special.name: Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
special.description: Chongyun's specialty. Though these springy noodles would be irresistible in the sweltering summer, Chongyun insists on dining on them even in the chattering cold of winter. What a guy.
special.effect: Restores 80 Stamina

name: Northern Apple Stew
description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Northern Apple Stew
suspicious.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. Apart from a slight sourness, it tastes just like any other down-to-earth braised meat dish, and lacks any fruity aroma. One might even wonder if the apples were put in there at all.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Northern Apple Stew
normal.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Northern Apple Stew
delicious.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

name: Northern Smoked Chicken
description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Northern Smoked Chicken
suspicious.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. It's true. You really ought to try your own cooking before serving it to your guests. It's not too late to make a new one, perhaps?
suspicious.effect: Restores 40 Stamina

normal.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
normal.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.
normal.effect: Restores 50 Stamina

delicious.name: Delicious Northern Smoked Chicken
delicious.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A dish fit for a king. Go on, find one and serve him with pride.
delicious.effect: Restores 60 Stamina

name: Omelette Rice
description: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The evenly beaten egg fluids are fried into half-doneness before being poured out on top of the rice, and tomato ketchup is drizzled over top afterward once it is ready to plate up. They say that this dish was derived from another region, though this version involves a more complicated cooking method.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Omelette Rice
suspicious.description: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The egg skin just about barely covers the rice, and it has been fried for so long that it has lost all fluidity. Might as well call it "fried egg on rice."
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Omelette Rice
normal.description: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The evenly beaten egg fluids are fried into half-doneness before being poured out on top of the rice, and tomato ketchup is drizzled over top afterward once it is ready to plate up. They say that this dish was derived from another region, though this version involves a more complicated cooking method.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Omelette Rice
delicious.description: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. Gently poking at the outer layer of the egg skin, which is not wholly cooked yet wraps itself and its red ketchup crown around the tightly packed white rice, shall prick the appetite of any customer — and after they have partaken joyfully, they cannot help but smile.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Oncidium Tofu
description: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. All the ingredients were sliced into ribbons in a single go, and after being washed, they were placed into the broth and cooked till they floated. The resulting flavor is light and fresh, and would not be out of place as a chef's recommendation in a Liyue restaurant.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Oncidium Tofu
suspicious.description: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. The erratic knifework here has caused the ingredients to be sliced every which way. The tattered mouthfeel is enough to make one despair. Only the rank taste of beans stands as proof that the main ingredient of this dish was tofu in the first place.
suspicious.effect: Restores 70 Stamina.

normal.name: Oncidium Tofu
normal.description: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. All the ingredients were sliced into ribbons in a single go, and after being washed, they were placed into the broth and cooked till they floated. The resulting flavor is light and fresh, and would not be out of place as a chef's recommendation in a Liyue restaurant.
normal.effect: Restores 85 Stamina.

delicious.name: Delicious Oncidium Tofu
delicious.description: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. The tofu, thread-thin as the autumn leaves, floats amidst the bowl, like mist in a forest, and the shredded bamboo shoots give the image a sweet, lustrous sheen, while the broth combines the essence of fowl and ham, giving off an unbelievable aroma. A single taste is enough to cause the customer to lose themselves in this fog of flavor.
delicious.effect: Restores 100 Stamina.

name: Onigiri
description: A portable dish made with rice. It is simple to make and remains delicious at room temperatures, which has made it very popular with civilians and soldiers alike.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Onigiri
suspicious.description: A portable dish made with rice. It just about has a triangular shape, but is so loose that it threatens to disintegrate should you pick it up. Yes, disintegrate — like the expectations of your prospective guests.
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Onigiri
normal.description: A portable dish made with rice. It is simple to make and remains delicious at room temperatures, which has made it very popular with civilians and soldiers alike.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Onigiri
delicious.description: A portable dish made with rice. The crispy seaweed adds a bit of umami to the down-to-earth sweetness of the glutinous rice. For the final touch, the fresh fish within the Onigiri strikes like an ambushing band, and the satisfaction it brings to body and mind is like the clarion flourish of victory.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

special.name: Dizziness-Be-Gone no Jutsu Version 2.0
special.description: Sayu's specialty. The Onigiri has been kneaded by Sayu into a cutesy shape — but remember, it's a mujina, not a tanuki, got it? And now that you mention it, this must be how Sayu can sleep for a whole day after eating, right?
special.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.

name: "Pile 'Em Up"
description: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.

suspicious.name: Suspicious "Pile 'Em Up"
suspicious.description: A rich, meaty dish. The meat must have been stacked wrong... Yeah, that's it. Now, can this actually be served...?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: "Pile 'Em Up"
normal.description: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious "Pile 'Em Up"
delicious.description: A rich, meaty dish. Piled in just the right way to be both aesthetically pleasing and delicious all the way through. I wonder if we can pile it a little higher...
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt"
special.description: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?
special.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s)

name: Qingce Stir Fry
description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Qingce Stir Fry
suspicious.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. This one was a failed test run, being unpleasantly bitter and uncomfortably spicy. You could try mixing it with rice — or you could simply discard it and eat the rice instead.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Qingce Stir Fry
normal.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Qingce Stir Fry
delicious.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. Just catching a whiff is enough to work up one's appetite. The tingle of chili titillates the tongue, leaving you ready to devour ten bowls in a single sitting.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Radish Veggie Soup
description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Radish Veggie Soup
suspicious.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Radish Veggie Soup
normal.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Radish Veggie Soup
delicious.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

name: Rice Buns
description: Soft and fluffy buns. The rice and horsetail have been ground into flour and kneaded into dough before being placed into a steaming basket. They can be eaten as-is or with a vegetable filling. Portable and satiating, it is a very popular dish in the Liyue region.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Rice Buns
suspicious.description: Soft and fluffy buns. The dough has not been proofed properly, meaning the buns did not puff up evenly during the steaming process. The resulting coarse, hard texture leaves much to be desired.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Rice Buns
normal.description: Soft and fluffy buns. The rice and horsetail have been ground into flour and kneaded into dough before being placed into a steaming basket. They can be eaten as-is or with a vegetable filling. Portable and satiating, it is a very popular dish in the Liyue region.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Rice Buns
delicious.description: Soft and fluffy buns. The unique sweetness of the whole grains passes between your teeth and lips as you chew. The relatively nondescript ingredients have been transformed into a true delicacy by your labors. This is one of the simple pleasures of the common folk and tastes best after some good, honest work.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

name: Rice Cake Soup
description: Commonly-seen city cuisine. The ingredients have gorged themselves on the soup, making them most enticing indeed. They say that in the first, this dish only had a scant few ingredients, but more were added as time passed, resulting in its present form.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Rice Cake Soup
suspicious.description: Commonly-seen city cuisine. These ingredients have cooked for so long that they have gone crisp. The only way to tell the components apart is by trawling the mix, having a small spoonful, and initiating further analysis.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Rice Cake Soup
normal.description: Commonly-seen city cuisine. The ingredients have gorged themselves on the soup, making them most enticing indeed. They say that in the first, this dish only had a scant few ingredients, but more were added as time passed, resulting in its present form.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Rice Cake Soup
delicious.description: Commonly-seen city cuisine. The freshness of light soup forms the perfect backdrop for the original flavor of the ingredients to stand out, giving you that ancient taste of Inazuma City. This back-to-basics cuisine is sure to make you feel warm inside when eaten on a snowy night as you travel alone.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Rice Pudding
description: A dessert made from rice. After cooking the rice beforehand, it is placed into a pot together with the other ingredients, stirred evenly, and steamed. The mouthfeel is fragrant and soft, a perfect denouement to any meal.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Rice Pudding
suspicious.description: A dessert made from rice. There must have been some miscalculation in the amount of ingredients to use, as this just tastes like a bowl of overly sweet rice. Well, time to grab some plain drink and scarf it down...
suspicious.effect: Restores 70 Stamina.

normal.name: Rice Pudding
normal.description: A dessert made from rice. After cooking the rice beforehand, it is placed into a pot together with the other ingredients, stirred evenly, and steamed. The mouthfeel is fragrant and soft, a perfect denouement to any meal.
normal.effect: Restores 85 Stamina.

delicious.name: Delicious Rice Pudding
delicious.description: A dessert made from rice. The soft, sticky rice and the sweet milk have melded together perfectly, their tastes complementing each other. If you eat it hot, you can enjoy the dense rice grains, and if you leave it till it's cold, you can savor the gentle fragrance of milk — each possessing its own beauty. People who eat such a dish cannot help but wonder: how many experiments led up to this moment?
delicious.effect: Restores 100 Stamina.

name: Sakura Mochi
description: A delicate and elegant snack. The dark green leaf adds complexity to the overall warm color palette. Just looking at it gives you a sense of its quiet beauty. 'Tis a shame that its lovely flavor is like a blooming flower in its transience — yet do not let that dissuade you from taking a bite.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sakura Mochi
suspicious.description: A delicate and elegant snack. Its exterior looks fair enough, but its sickening sweetness almost causes it to get stuck in your throat, leaving you with no appetite for another.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Sakura Mochi
normal.description: A delicate and elegant snack. The dark green leaf adds complexity to the overall warm color palette. Just looking at it gives you a sense of its quiet beauty. 'Tis a shame that its lovely flavor is like a blooming flower in its transience — yet do not let that dissuade you from taking a bite.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Sakura Mochi
delicious.description: A delicate and elegant snack. It is surrounded by the fragrance of sakura, and its elegant exterior hides a loveliness that comes forth and disappears in a single instant. In a moment when all is silent, a single taste returns you to the moment when the sakura were as a blizzard all about you.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

special.name: "Snow on the Hearth"
special.description: Kamisato Ayaka's specialty. This is almost like a small, lovely, and intricate artwork, with its pale red outer coat covering the feelings that the young maiden began to harbor from that moment on. If one had the honor of enjoy such a treat while having tea with a princess as graceful and noble as a white heron, one would surely yearn to have that moment stretch into eternity.
special.effect: Revives the selected character and restores 20% of Max HP, then restores an additional 1500 HP.

name: Sakura Tempura
description: A dish deep-fried in oil. Incorporate the marinated sakura blossom petals into the batter before giving the fresh shrimp and vegetables an even coating, frying, and then draining the oil. This all sounds simple enough, but good tempura making is not something achieved in a mere day.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sakura Tempura
suspicious.description: A dish deep-fried in oil. Perhaps it is an inexperience in controlling oil temperatures showing, but the ingredients began giving off a pungent smoke the instant they were dipped into the wok. The batter is now all mottled and browned. Shame about the waste... but best not to eat it, perhaps.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Sakura Tempura
normal.description: A dish deep-fried in oil. Incorporate the marinated sakura blossom petals into the batter before giving the fresh shrimp and vegetables an even coating, frying, and then draining the oil. This all sounds simple enough, but good tempura making is not something achieved in a mere day.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Sakura Tempura
delicious.description: A dish deep-fried in oil. The batter is thin and sheer, like a set of luxurious clothes over the ingredients. The outside crispness and freshness within form amazing layers of texture, leading those who eat it to marvel at just how this delicacy was created.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Sashimi Platter
description: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. The fish and shellfish are cut into pieces and arranged neatly. The slices have an elegant and tender taste, providing rich and high-quality nutrition. The lingering sweet aftertaste is derived fully from the ingredients' freshness, and every bite is an enjoyment worth closing one's eyes and savoring.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sashimi Platter
suspicious.description: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. This has to be a practice dish. The rusty knife-work has ruined the original flavor of the ingredients, nor have the fish scales on the sashimi slices been completely cleaned off. It's... probably not too late to seek professional help...
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Sashimi Platter
normal.description: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. The fish and shellfish are cut into pieces and arranged neatly. The slices have an elegant and tender taste, providing rich and high-quality nutrition. The lingering sweet aftertaste is derived fully from the ingredients' freshness, and every bite is an enjoyment worth closing one's eyes and savoring.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Sashimi Platter
delicious.description: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. The plate spread before you is like a work of art, almost too beautiful to shatter. The surpassing knife-work has imparted the greatest mouthfeel upon the ingredients possible. The delicate texture, the exquisite springiness, the natural sweetness... it is like something living is leaping inside your mouth — straight from the ocean and into your heart.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Satisfying Salad
description: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Satisfying Salad
suspicious.description: A vegetable salad. Regrettably, it seems the best time to plate the potatoes and boiled eggs was missed.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Satisfying Salad
normal.description: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Satisfying Salad
delicious.description: A vegetable salad. Fresh, light, and varied. You'd never get tired of eating this, even if you had to eat it for the rest of your life.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Der Weisheit Letzter Schluss (Life)
special.description: Mona's specialty. A great work from a great astrologer. Its greatest aspect lies with its cost-effectiveness in filling one's stomach.
special.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Sautéed Matsutake
description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. Cooked in butter, it's crisp outside yet tender inside. Eat it before someone steals it from you.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sautéed Matsutake
suspicious.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. A shame that control of the fire was lost. Best you can do now is try to trick people who didn't see you cooking it into thinking they are just potato chips.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Sautéed Matsutake
normal.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. Cooked in butter, it's crisp outside yet tender inside. Eat it before someone steals it from you.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Sautéed Matsutake
delicious.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. So smooth and fragrant, eating them is like having the bursting vitality of spring absorbed into your stomach.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Squirrel Fish
description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Squirrel Fish
suspicious.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. Sure, you can make out the shape of the fish, but you can't see how it's related to any squirrel. It just proves that the more complicated the dish is to prepare, the harder it is to prepare it well.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Squirrel Fish
normal.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Squirrel Fish
delicious.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is expertly handled to exhibit an elegant shape; however, the exquisitely balanced sweet-and-sour taste is really where the dish truly comes alive. The culinary skills involved in preparing this dish can impress even the greatest chefs of Liyue.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

name: Steak
description: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Steak
suspicious.description: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Steak
normal.description: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Steak
delicious.description: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
special.description: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

name: Sticky Honey Roast
description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sticky Honey Roast
suspicious.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The sauce has stuck like glue to the meat, forming a homogeneous mass that tastes neither of honey nor meat.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Sticky Honey Roast
normal.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Sticky Honey Roast
delicious.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Stir-Fried Filet
description: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Filet
suspicious.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Stir-Fried Filet
normal.description: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Filet
delicious.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Flash-Fried Filet
special.description: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

name: Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
description: A main dish with an intense flavor. Created by stir-frying rice noodles, par-cooked fish, and various side dishes in a wok on high flame. The noodles, having absorbed the flavors of the various ingredients, are springy and smooth to the taste, making this dish a big hit with diners.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
suspicious.description: A main dish with an intense flavor. You can barely tell where the rice noodles end and the fish begins. The soft, floppy mouthfeel is almost unbearable — how could something that looked this simple actually require so much craft?
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
normal.description: A main dish with an intense flavor. Created by stir-frying rice noodles, par-cooked fish, and various side dishes in a wok on high flame. The noodles, having absorbed the flavors of the various ingredients, are springy and smooth to the taste, making this dish a big hit with diners.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
delicious.description: A main dish with an intense flavor. The sumptuous, fresh look is already enough to leave people salivating, and one bite will surely lead to another. The smooth rice noodles and tender fish grant this meal a seat at any gourmet's table, its pedestrian ingredients notwithstanding.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

name: Stir-Fried Shrimp
description: A mild and luscious dish. The shrimp are quickly sautéed and the sauce thickened. This method of cooking is exceedingly simple and brings out the wonderful natural flavor of the shrimp meat, granting it a place in humble home-cooked dinners and lavish banquets alike.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Stir-Fried Shrimp
suspicious.description: A mild and luscious dish. In an overzealous attempt to prevent the food from sticking to the bottom of the pot, too much oil was added. Despite having been subjected to this rather heavy-duty frying process, the shrimp still have a surprisingly pleasant texture — but mind you don't eat too many, or you'll get a sore throat.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Stir-Fried Shrimp
normal.description: A mild and luscious dish. The shrimp are quickly sautéed and the sauce thickened. This method of cooking is exceedingly simple and brings out the wonderful natural flavor of the shrimp meat, granting it a place in humble home-cooked dinners and lavish banquets alike.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Shrimp
delicious.description: A mild and luscious dish. The plump shrimp are packed full of flavor just waiting to burst out on the first bite, creating wave after wave of indulgent deliciousness, like drops of water falling one by one onto a still lake, ending just as the sweet aftertaste finally begins to emerge.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Stone Harbor Delicacies
suspicious.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. Improper oil temperature control has caused the ingredients to reek of oil. Those who eat but a single bite will shake their heads and mourn the loss of the rare violetgrass used.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
normal.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Stone Harbor Delicacies
delicious.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. The scents of the earth, the cool shade, and the moistness of the mist have all been enjoined into this plate of freshness. Pair it with simple white rice — both your taste buds and your soul shall experience a down-to-earth satisfaction many times over.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Sunshine Sprat
description: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, it is delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sunshine Sprat
suspicious.description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish has been fried too long, which has deprived it of all its freshness and springiness. The slightest touch with your utensils might cause it to break into small pieces.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Sunshine Sprat
normal.description: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, it is delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Sunshine Sprat
delicious.description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish melts in your mouth, melding the flavors of land and sea together as it does, making for an unforgettable experience. Little wonder, then, that such a simply-made dish can make it into restaurants of great class.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: Woodland Dream
special.description: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.
special.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Sweet Madame
description: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sweet Madame
suspicious.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Sweet Madame
normal.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Sweet Madame
delicious.description: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Dinner of Judgment
special.description: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.
special.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 1,750 HP to the selected character.

name: Sweet Shrimp Sushi
description: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. Cleanly bisected shrimp is laid over rice and shaped with your bare hands. The springy shrimp meat and the delicious rice highlight the flavor all the more.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Sweet Shrimp Sushi
suspicious.description: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. The shrimp look a little shriveled, and a single bite leaves grains of rice stuck to your teeth. Note to self: best not to leave it out for so long next time...
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Sweet Shrimp Sushi
normal.description: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. Cleanly bisected shrimp is laid over rice and shaped with your bare hands. The springy shrimp meat and the delicious rice highlight the flavor all the more.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Sweet Shrimp Sushi
delicious.description: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. Crystal-clear shrimp reclines on the snow-white piles of rice. The sourness of the vinegared grains and sweetness of the meat intertwine upon your tongue like the gentle dance of lapping waves on white shores.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

name: Taiyaki
description: A snack shaped like a snapper. The crisp exterior wraps the sweet filling within and is very popular amongst Inazumans. It is said that in the beginning, this was just a cylindrical snack, but constant improvements wound up shaping it into the cutesy image of a fish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Taiyaki
suspicious.description: A snack shaped like a snapper. The filling is way too sweet, with a single small bite leaving you in dire need of some water to wash it all down. Even the sweetest of teeth will find stomaching this a rather tall order.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

normal.name: Taiyaki
normal.description: A snack shaped like a snapper. The crisp exterior wraps the sweet filling within and is very popular amongst Inazumans. It is said that in the beginning, this was just a cylindrical snack, but constant improvements wound up shaping it into the cutesy image of a fish.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.name: Delicious Taiyaki
delicious.description: A snack shaped like a snapper. Fresh out of the oven, this taiyaki gives off a titillating aroma while it is still a mite scalding to the touch. A single bite causes the sweetness to melt in your mouth instantly. The feeling is akin to watching a fish in a pool bathed in sunset's gleam, its scales attaining a golden sheen.
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

name: Tea Break Pancake
description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tea Break Pancake
suspicious.description: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Tea Break Pancake
normal.description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Tea Break Pancake
delicious.description: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

special.name: Lighter-Than-Air Pancake
special.description: Noelle's specialty. These thick pastries are the special afternoon snacks of the Knights of Favonius. They give people the sense that they have fallen upon a layer of fluffy clouds, and seeing Noelle's smile makes the feeling all the sweeter!
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

name: Teyvat Fried Egg
description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Teyvat Fried Egg
suspicious.description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

normal.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
normal.description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Teyvat Fried Egg
delicious.description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

special.name: Teyvat Charred Egg
special.description: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lends a whole new flavor to the dish.
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.

name: Tianshu Meat
description: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tianshu Meat
suspicious.description: A braised meat dish. It's been braised for too long, resulting in meat that's too soft. The fatty cuts are greasy enough to give you palpitations, and you can barely scarf them down even when wrapped in the Qingxin leaves.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 25% and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Tianshu Meat
normal.description: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 35% and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Tianshu Meat
delicious.description: A braised meat dish. Its intense aroma can be detected from miles away. The ingredients look exquisite in every way, capturing the essence of its original design. It would not look out of place on a gourmet spread at Yuehai Pavilion.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 45% and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Tonkotsu Ramen
description: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The meat, prepared at low temperature, is laid over the noodles. Salty, fragrant, delicious soup seeps into each strand. A single bowl of these is guaranteed to restore any tired soul.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tonkotsu Ramen
suspicious.description: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The noodles were all but forgotten amid the hubbub of preparing the accoutrements, leading to it almost turning into a paste and becoming one with the soup. Oh well, at least you can drink the whole lot to salvage it a bit.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
normal.description: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The meat, prepared at low temperature, is laid over the noodles. Salty, fragrant, delicious soup seeps into each strand. A single bowl of these is guaranteed to restore any tired soul.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Tonkotsu Ramen
delicious.description: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The springy noodles have absorbed the essence of the soup, and the accoutrements have added all manner of variation to the mouthfeel. The soup has preserved the strong fragrance of the bones used to make it, yet goes down gently without that greasy feeling. Before you know it, the bowl's all gone, and you've still got room for more.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

name: Tricolor Dango
description: A soft, glutinous snack. Glutinous rice has been ground into powder and rolled into a ball before being steamed. The Sakura Bloom and Snapdragon colors lend an extra liveliness to these dango.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tricolor Dango
suspicious.description: A soft, glutinous snack. One suspects a lack of water used in the cooking process as the culprit in the cracks all over this dish. Don't force it down your throat, or you might just choke...
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Tricolor Dango
normal.description: A soft, glutinous snack. Glutinous rice has been ground into powder and rolled into a ball before being steamed. The Sakura Bloom and Snapdragon colors lend an extra liveliness to these dango.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Tricolor Dango
delicious.description: A soft, glutinous snack. The luster of these dango is like the falling morning dew, and it gives off the feeling of lush flowers and branches. When watching the flowers, eating this snack gives one a sense of happiness, as if the whole following year shall be as gorgeous as the falling flowers before them.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Summer Festival Fish
special.description: Yoimiya's specialty. Watching the fireworks, your hands full of the snacks Yoimiya's given you, her carefree, child-like laughter in your ear as the pyrotechnics burst overhead... Amid this unique symphony of sounds, the plump goldfish in your hand almost looks like it might start swimming at any moment...
special.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

name: Tri-Flavored Skewer
description: A pieced-together skewer. Three different cooking processes can be tasted at a go in this dish, which has made it very popular. If you are ever at a loss at to what to pair with some wine, there's no going wrong with one of these.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tri-Flavored Skewer
suspicious.description: A pieced-together skewer. The burnt bamboo stick and the dull-colored ingredients give off a smell that must not be named. If you were to make this out in the wild, you might just attract some hilichurls...
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Tri-Flavored Skewer
normal.description: A pieced-together skewer. Three different cooking processes can be tasted at a go in this dish, which has made it very popular. If you are ever at a loss at to what to pair with some wine, there's no going wrong with one of these.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Tri-Flavored Skewer
delicious.description: A pieced-together skewer. The highly-refined temperature control has released sizzling blooms of oils. The many seasonings accentuate the flavor of the various ingredients. If there was but a little less of them, it would be too plain; if a little more, too dense. This keen balance reveals the craftsman's heart within the chef.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Triple-Layered Consommé
description: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Triple-Layered Consommé
suspicious.description: A neatly arranged dish. It certainly looks the part, but tasting it reveals the blandness of the consommé. Was it diluted too much, perhaps?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Triple-Layered Consommé
normal.description: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Triple-Layered Consommé
delicious.description: A neatly-arranged dish. The evenly-sized threads reveal exquisite knife-work. Rather than a dish, this seems more like a work of art. But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss — leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

name: Tuna Sushi
description: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The soft and lightly-vinegared rice is matched with the fresh fish. Locals consider this a slightly luxurious treat.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Tuna Sushi
suspicious.description: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The color of the fish slices looks a little weird, and it's hard to tell if the problem here is the sour rice or the rank fish.
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Tuna Sushi
normal.description: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The soft and lightly-vinegared rice is matched with the fresh fish. Locals consider this a slightly luxurious treat.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Tuna Sushi
delicious.description: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The delicate fat lines the fish slices like hoarfrost falling on a road, and the balance of fat and lean is perfect. The make of this dish is not fancy in the slightest, but has imparted both the profundity of field and sea to the tasting tongue.
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

name: Universal Peace
description: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Universal Peace
suspicious.description: Colorful staple food. Too much moisture was lost during the cooking process — at this point, it would take some imagination (and some extra water) to recoup the intended taste.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Universal Peace
normal.description: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Universal Peace
delicious.description: Colorful staple food. The sweet-and-sour preserved fruit is bound to the rich mouthfeel of the rice as if by invisible threads. Even after you swallow, the faint fragrance remains on your lips, increasing your sense of satisfaction by an order of magnitude.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

special.name: Prosperous Peace
special.description: Ganyu's specialty. The image of a resting qilin is by itself enough to calm a person down. Ganyu has put her well-wishes for all that is lovely in this world into this dish — and she's saved some of her favorite Qingxin Flowers just for you, too.
special.effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.

name: Vegetarian Abalone
description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Vegetarian Abalone
suspicious.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The overly thick sauce has totally covered the freshness that the ingredients should have had, and the condiment leaves your mouth dry no matter how much you wash it down with water.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Vegetarian Abalone
normal.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Vegetarian Abalone
delicious.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. With the aid of the sauce, the matsutake has achieved an excellent, elegant mouth-feel that so rivals scallop in tenderness and abalone in freshness that you can hardly tell them apart. If you left your customer guessing before revealing the truth later, you would be sure to earn their astonished praise.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

special.name: Ghostly March
special.description: Hu Tao's specialty. The round-faced ghouls seem quite cute, squeezed into a pile as they are. But if you were to fall to temptation and try but one of them, you may yet come to regret it for a long while... After all, this plate is full of top-quality, taste-bud-blasting— Actually, what on earth is this stuff, anyway?
special.effect: Revives a character and restores 15% of Max HP, then restores an additional 550 HP.

name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is not actually a swear word in the local language.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
suspicious.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Even if the dish was extremely delicious, it surely doesn't look the part. Even the most popular stalls would have trouble selling this.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
normal.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is not actually a swear word in the local language.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
delicious.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. The authentic "Liyue taste" of this aromatic dish makes it a comfort food for golden-agers that may bring a tear to their eyes.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
